sentences.sentence: He is one of the most hawkish members of the new cabinet.
sentences.translation: 他是新内阁中最具鹰派色彩的成员之一。

sentences.sentence: Iran and Venezuela are much more hawkish.
sentences.translation: 伊朗和委内瑞拉则更加强硬。

sentences.sentence: But when he grasped how troubled the Banks were, he softened his hawkish rhetoric.
sentences.translation: 但是当意识到银行的困境之后，他放松了其强硬辞令。
